kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Get Cookie
kw.doc: Returns information of cookie with ``name`` as an object.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=myssion, url=http://localhost/Project/tschool/api, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-XSRF-TOKEN': '%3D'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost/Project/tschool/api/contact path_url=/Project/tschool/api/contact headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-XSRF-TOKEN': '%3D', 'Content-Length': '99'} body=b'{"hoten": "test", "email": "test@gmail.com", "sodienthoai": "8528888820", "khoahocquantam": "test"}'

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
